```js
# Editor configuration, see https://editorconfig.org
root = true
[*]
charset = utf-8
indent_style = space
indent_size = 2

trim_trailing_whitespace = true
[*.ts]
quote_type = single
ij_typescript_use_double_quotes = false
[*.md]
max_line_length = off
trim_trailing_whitespace = false
```
